org.edg.data.replication.optorsim
Class CombinedCostResourceBroker

java.lang.Object
  org.edg.data.replication.optorsim.SkelResourceBroker
      org.edg.data.replication.optorsim.CombinedCostResourceBroker
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable, ResourceBroker
public class CombinedCostResourceBroker
extends SkelResourceBroker

This class is an implementation of the ResourceBroker which selects sites on which to run jobs according to the "queue access cost" -estimated time to get all files for the current job + to get all files for all jobs in the queue at the CE in question.

Copyright (c) 2004 CERN, ITC-irst, PPARC, on behalf of the EU DataGrid. For license conditions see LICENSE file or http://www.edg.org/license.html

Since:
JDK1.4
